$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Dy.text:
\define tm-delete-tiddler-actions()
\define tv-action-refresh-policy() always
<$let targetTiddler={{{ [<event-param>!is[blank]else<event-tiddlerTitle>] }}} history={{{ [<tv-history-list>get[text]] }}}
	  patchesID={{{ [<targetTiddler>get[created]] }}} >
	<$action-sendmessage $message=<<event-type>> $param=<<targetTiddler>> />
    <!-- only perform actions if delete was not canceled -->
    <$list filter="[<targetTiddler>!is[tiddler]]" variable="void">
        <$list filter="[<tv-history-list>get[current-tiddler]match<targetTiddler>]" variable="void">
            <$let previousItem={{{ [<history>jsonindexes[]] :map[<history>jsonget<currentTiddler>,[title]] :intersection[list<tv-story-list>] +[!match<targetTiddler>reverse[]first[]] :else[list<tv-story-list>before<targetTiddler>] :else[list<tv-story-list>after<targetTiddler>] :else[{$:/mwi/DefaultTiddler}] }}}>
                <$action-navigate $to=<<previousItem>> />
            </$let>
        </$list>
	</$list>
</$let>
\end

<$messagecatcher $tm-delete-tiddler=<<tm-delete-tiddler-actions>> >
	<$slot $name=ts-raw />
</$messagecatcher>
$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Dy.title: $:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/DynamicPageContent/tm-delete-tiddler

$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.text:
\whitespace trim \import [[$:/core/ui/PageMacros]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Macro]!has[draft.of]] <$vars tv-config-toolbar-icons={{$:/config/Toolbar/Icons}} tv-config-toolbar-text={{$:/config/Toolbar/Text}} tv-config-toolbar-class={{$:/config/Toolbar/ButtonClass}} tv-enable-drag-and-drop={{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}} tv-show-missing-links={{$:/config/MissingLinks}} storyviewTitle={{$:/view}} languageTitle={{{ [{$:/language}get[name]] }}}>
] [[tc-language-]addsuffix] :and[unique[]join[ ]] }}} > <$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}> <$dropzone enable=<>> <$transclude $tiddler="$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/DynamicPageContent" filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/DynamicPageTemplate]!has[draft.of]]"> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/PageTemplate]!has[draft.of]] :and[append[$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/PageTemplate/story]remove[$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/story]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/>
$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.title: $:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/PageTemplate
$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.name: ~SingleTiddlerView
$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.description: shows a single tiddler at a time

$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.text:
\whitespace trim

\define single-tiddler() [{$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler}] :intersection[list<tv-story-list>]

\define story-filter() [{$:/view}!match[minimal]] :then[list<tv-story-list>] :else[subfilter<single-tiddler>]

<section class="tc-story-river" role="main">

<section class="story-backdrop">

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]!has[draft.of]]">

<$transclude/>

</$list>

</section>

<$list filter="[subfilter<story-filter>]" history="$:/HistoryList" template="$:/core/ui/StoryTiddlerTemplate" storyview={{$:/view}} emptyMessage={{$:/config/EmptyStoryMessage}}/>

<section class="story-frontdrop">

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/BelowStory]!has[draft.of]]">

<$transclude/>

</$list>

</section>

</section>
$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/Pa.title: $:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/PageTemplate/story

$:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/re.title: $:/plugins/yaisog/single-tiddler-view/readme
